comments.html:
Indeed, it seems they took the difficult decision of working on a solution that solves real problems, instead of creating solutions that are looking for problems or reinventing the wheel as you mention in your article

>I’ve stretched firewall clusters and MLAGs, OTV and LISP, NSX UDLR’s and F5 EtherIPs. I’ve done ingress route optimization with host routing, LISP, mobile ARP, Python scripts, and F5 VIP advertisements. I’ve dealt with storage metroclusters, geoclusters, and clusterf***’ ...

by the way I'm missing openflow and all its derivative work in that list ;)
comments.name: Antonio Ojea
